summary: A small island with a Hogwarts style library at its top. This is not a completed mod, but I don't have time to keep working on this, so I thought I would put it up for others to check out. Feel free to use or expand on it if you want to. The worldspace is accessed by a linking book under a table in the Winterhold College Arcanaeum.
descriptionHtml:
A small island with a Hogwarts style library at its top. This is not a completed mod, but I don't have time to keep working on this, so I thought I would put it up for others to check out. Feel free to use or expand on it if you want to. The worldspace is accessed by a linking book under a table in the Winterhold College Arcanaeum. Just read it and you'll be whooshed away. Read the other book on the shore and you'll go back. Note that this does not support companion transport currently.

This was originally going to be a large project, with a Myst style world traversing system. I always felt the Black Books in Dragonborn were a wasted opportunity, and instead of being mysterious puzzle filled worlds, they were just a small dungeon with some enemies to fight. So I wanted a system of strange worlds and magic that would be like a interlocking maze, connected by books. As it is, life caught up with me, and I gave up on making more than what is here. There are a few locations I made that aren't linked to the main world, like a slaver's compound, and the Worm Trench, and the Caul. If anyone wanted to make this work, they're welcome to.
author: Seelabin
